entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers late this morning and this afternoon. Snow level rising to 900 metres this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
